entry_requirements_raw.SPM: Aggregate of 20 points or less across 5 academic subjects.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level: 2 C grades and 2 D grades in 4 academic subjects.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc

course_content.core: Core English for Academic Purposes (EAP) Assessment method 50% final examinations + 50% internal assessment Pass mark for elective courses is 50% A number of courses have increased the variety of their assessment methods to include one or more of the following: Digital assessments Collaborative assessments Research-based assessments Practical assessments Assessments that include a presentation (e.g. face-to-face, video) Assessments that give students choices Assessments that are larger, spread over a longer time, and allow for drafting/checking in throughout  Foundation Studies - Fast Track (8-9 months) Entry Requirements SPM : 5B+ (15 points across 5 academic subjects) O-Level : 4C English Requirement IELTS : 5.5 (no band less than 5.0)

SPM.text: Aggregate of 20 points or less across 5 academic subjects.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc

O-Level.text: 2 C grades and 2 D grades in 4 academic subjects.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc

entry_requirements_raw.O-Level: 1 B grades and 3 C grades in 4 academic subjects.  Non academic subject e.g. Bahasa Melayu, English, Pendidikan Islam etc
